name: What We Need
description:
What We Need is a text-based adventure game, in which you struggle to sustain an immigrant family's needs along their journey for hope.

What We Need was developed during Amber Game Jam 2015, at Bilgi University, Istanbul.

With What We Need, we aimed to provide a medium for the players to empathize with the real immigrants.

Arda Cevik - Programming & Game Design

Dilara Eksi - Game Design
